members.joinCircumstances: Founded the Breed Pirates and uses his Peto Peto powers to control enslaved crew members.

keyMoments.title: Arena Headquarters Shown
keyMoments.description: Breed's base of operations, a massive underground arena where he forces controlled beings to fight for entertainment, is revealed.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the scale of Breed's operation and his twisted entertainment business.

keyMoments.title: World Domination Scheme
keyMoments.description: Breed reveals his plan to use Caesar and SMILE fruits to create a world where all humans are transformed into animals under his control.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the crew's ultimate goal of world domination through forced transformation.

ships.description: A large vessel with an underwater entrance and massive internal arena for entertainment battles.

members.joinCircumstances: Founded the Sea Animal Pirates after being inspired by Luffy during the Alabasta Arc.

keyMoments.title: Kung-Fu Dugong's Crew Returns
keyMoments.description: The Sea Animal Pirates, led by the Kung-Fu Dugong from Alabasta, are revealed to have reached the New World before being captured by Breed.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even minor characters from past arcs were inspired by Luffy to pursue their dreams.
